meanings.definition: Carried or transported by the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skyborne bird glided effortlessly through the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloon floated skyborne above the city.
meanings.sent3: The skyborne kite danced playfully in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The skyborne dreams of the young pilot soared high.
meanings.sent5: The skyborne stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Originating or coming from the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skyborne raindrops fell gently on the parched land.
meanings.sent2: The rainbow appeared after the skyborne rain shower.
meanings.sent3: The skyborne clouds gathered for a celestial meeting.
meanings.sent4: The skyborne sunlight illuminated the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The skyborne lightning struck the tallest tree in the forest.
